p: The plant part (stembarks) was washed and shade-dried for two weeks. The dried stembarks were further chopped into small pieces. The chopped stembarks (2.0 kg) was macerated in 97% methanol for 72 hr to give the crude methanol extract. The liquid filtrate was concentrated and evaporated to dryness in vacuo at 40°C using a rotary evaporator. The dried crude extract was deposited in a refrigerator at 4°C prior to use for the proposed experiment.
